title: Exclusive: Newly obtained records show Trump and Jim Jordan spoke at length on morning of January 6 - CNN
content:
1. Exclusive: Newly obtained records show Trump and Jim Jordan spoke at length on morning of January 6  CNN
  2. National Archives says it will turn over Mike Pence's records to January 6 panel  CBS News
  3. National Archives tells Trump it plans to hand Mike Penceâ€™s records over to Capitol riots committee  The Independent
  4. National Archives to give Mike Pence documents to Jan. 6 committee  Yahoo News
  5. National Archives to give Mike Pence records to House January 6th committee  CBS News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The House select committee investigating the Capitol insurrection is now in possession of White House records that provide new details about a phone call Donald Trump made to Republican Rep. Jim Jordan on January 6, 2021 -- as the investigation drills down on the former President's communications that day and questions have long swirled around calls between him and lawmakers.
